Name: Waaghals
Review Text: Really nice cozy record store right in the centre of Arnhem. The shop owner was very friendly. There are three turn tables where you can listen to your records as well. You can find new and used vinyls and CDs here. Do check it out.

Name: Waaghals
Review Text: Friendly personnel. Many bargain offerings of great artists. both second hand and new selections. Vinyl and cd's. All genres. Lack of focus results in a patchy collection on offer. Of interest to people on a string or persons starting out as music collector.

Name: Waaghals
Review Text: Tastefull vinyl selector. I came home with some jazz and world and realized the media was still in plastic protection sleeves! Nice !!

Name: Waaghals
Review Text: An excellent record store (albums, CDs). They sell new and second hand....and very knowledgeable and friendly staff.

Name: Waaghals
Review Text: Fun little shop, tons of vinyl including some more obscure artists and loads of second hand so you're not necessarily spending tons.

Name: Waaghals
Review Text:
Awesome recordstore with a large selection of vinyl and a must stop by if you're in the city.
I have been buying here for years now.

Name: Waaghals
Review Text: Nice people and modest prices...for me just only a few metal gems ;)

Name: Waaghals
Review Text: If you love music, you love this place! They have everything you need and the staff is very helpful. I would suggest going here if only for the love of music.
